title: 1935 Branded A Coward ( Johnny Mack Brown)

sources.title: 1935 Branded A Coward ( Johnny Mack Brown)
sources.description: Safely from behind some shrubbery, Johnny Hume, a boy of 6 or 7, witnesses the slaughter of his mother, father and brother by the guns of a gang led by "the Cat". Twenty years later finds Johnny grown to manhood, an expert bronc rider and target shooter - but paralyzed with fearful memories in an actual gunfight.  Notation: The You Tube Account "The Old Shows" has liberty to re-distribute and commercialize any content from any of our sites
